summary: A freewheeling portrait of Ken Kesey and the Merry Pranksters' fabled road trip across America.
cast: Stanley Tucci|Jim Meskimen|Veronica Taylor|Timothy Leary|Jerry Garcia|Ken Kesey|Ram Dass|Jack Kerouac|Allen Ginsberg|Terry Gross|Andrea Cirie|Grateful Dead|Bob Weir|Neal Cassady|Bill Kreutzmann|Phil Lesh|Karen Gilliam|Ken Babbs|Ron McKernan|Paula Sundsten|Stark Naked|Steve Lambrecht|Sandy Lehmann-Haupt|Jane Burton|John Babbs|Kathy Casamo|George Walker|Gretchen Fetchen
title: Magic Trip: Ken Kesey's Search for a Kool Place
